modName: Star Wars sounds in Skyrim - Huge WIP
summary: Ever wanted to play Skyrim with the epic music from the Star Wars movies playing in the background?  Search no more!
descriptionHtml:
***THIS MOD IS STILL A HUGE WIP!***

What this mod does:
- Changes the Main theme in Skyrim to the Menu theme of the SW movies.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:
V0.1
- Changed the main theme in Skyrim to the menu theme in the SW movies.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation:
See the Read-me.

Uninstallation:
Delete the folder named \"special\" located in Data/music.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also check out my other mod: Zelda sounds in Skyrim.
Link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12166

Feel free to add sugestions, and tell me if you find any bugs!

I can also do other mod\'s if you dont like SW music, send me a message with sugestions for other mods. :)
author: mrLOLsir
